com.cinemamanager.controller

Class MovieController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cinemamanager.controller.MovieController

  • public class MovieController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for handling user interactions in the MovieView.

    This controller connects the UI (view) with the data access layer (DAO). It listens for button actions (Add, Update, Delete), retrieves user input from the view, validates it, and delegates persistence operations to the MovieDao implementation.

    It also uses AlertUtils to display feedback to the user, such as success messages, warnings, or error dialogs.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Boban Vesin

      • MovieController

        public MovieController(MovieView view,
                       java.sql.Connection connection)
        Constructs a controller with a view and a JDBC connection.

        This constructor creates a MovieDaoImpl internally.

        Parameters:
        view - the movie view
        connection - the JDBC connection to be wrapped in a DAO

    • Method Detail

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Refreshes the movie list in the view.

        Fetches movies from the DAO and updates the table in the UI.

        Displays an error alert if loading fails.
